splash.my.name: My name is
splash.description: I have knowledge about the tools and technologies used in the development of web applications, focusing especially on the front-end area. My skills include designing interfaces and developing applications in React and Angular environments. Thanks to the acquired knowledge and skills, I am able to create attractive, interactive interfaces tailored to the unique needs of users.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I completed two different fields of study, earning the titles of Energy Engineer and Project Manager. My interest in programming and front-end technologies emerged during this time. After graduation, I deepened my knowledge in web development by taking numerous online courses and creating my own projects, which you can find in the projects section. Through this, I became familiar with various front-end technologies and gained the skills needed to create modern user interfaces. In my personal life, I place a strong emphasis on self-development and effective time management. I believe that efficiently managed time and consistency are the keys to continuous self-improvement.

studies.title: Studies
studies.description: During my studies in the IT department, I created my first website, which sparked my passion for programming.

skillsList.name: Core Web Development
skillsList.description: Core Web Development skills are essential for creating modern and efficient web applications. Mastering these technologies enables building responsive, fast, and user-friendly websites.

skillsList.name: Libraries and Frameworks
skillsList.description: Libraries and frameworks offer powerful tools and reusable components that accelerate development. They help create scalable and maintainable web applications efficiently.

skillsList.name: Tools and Technologies
skillsList.description: Utilizing the right tools enhances productivity and collaboration during development. They assist in writing, testing, and deploying code efficiently while maintaining high quality.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.hoverMessage: Hover over a project to see its description

list.title: Calories Counter
list.description: This application is designed to help you calculate your caloric needs and track daily calorie intake. The app was built using Angular v17 with a less modern modular approach, mainly managing state via services and the RxJS library. Data is stored and retrieved in the cloud using Firebase's API.

list.title: Progress Counter
list.description: This app allows you to analyze your strength progress. It lets you set up individual workouts, add exercises, and analyze charts related to your achievements. The app was built using Angular v17 with a modern approach, utilizing standalone components and signals. State management is handled by NgRx Signal Store, and data is stored and retrieved in the cloud using Firebase's API.

list.title: Portfolio
list.description: A portfolio website containing the key information that highlights me as a Front-End Developer and encourages others to collaborate with me. The site is built using React, with Redux used for state management. Material UI was used for faster development of certain components. The app does not interact with a backend.
